channel.title: Essays on Andy's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Essays on Andy's Blog

item.title: The Superficiality of Networking
item.description: Unfinished Networking, as defined by the Oxford dictionary, is the “action or process of interacting with others to exchange information and develop professional or social contacts”. Networking, as defined by my past experiences, is the “action or process where you get to dress fancy and drink beers with professionals from prospective fields, however given that you’re a lightweight but also slightly alcoholic, slowly get drunk off like 2 pints whilst trying your hardest to remain professional and not slur while talking with the CEO of the biggest superannuation company in Austrlaia”.
